item.title: Screen Recording Using FFMPEG
item.description: Video Only # ffmpeg -f x11grab -s $(xdpyinfo | grep dimensions | awk {'print $2;'}) -i :0.0 out.mkv Audio Only # ffmpeg -f alsa -i default out.ogg Video & Audio # ffmpeg -f x11grab -s $(xdpyinfo | grep dimensions | awk {'print $2;'}) -i :0.0 -f alsa -i default out.mkv
